title: Skript Error
author: Allen-zhang
txt_content:
本人想写一个DeathSpec的插件,代码如下 ->

on player respawn:
        set player's gamemode to adventure
        hide player from all players
        set {deathspec.%player%} to true
        set player's flight mode to true
        set player's fly state to true
on damage:
        damage was caused by contact, attack, projectile, suffocation, fall, fire, burning, melting, lava, drowning, block explosion, entity explosion, void, lightning, suicide, starvation, poison, potion, wither, falling block, thorns or unknown
        victim is a player
        if victim is {deathspec.%player%}:
                cancel event                        
cancel the event
on drop:
    {deathspec.%player%} is true
cancel the event
on pick up:
    {deathspec.%player%} is true
cancel the event
on place:
    {deathspec.%player%} is true
cancel the event
on join:
    remove player from {deathspec.%player%}
on damage of player:
        victim is a player
        if {nospecdamage.%player%} is true
        cancel the event
on join:
    set {nospecdamage.%player%} to true
on script load:
delete {deathspec.%player%}
delete {nospecdamage.%player%}

现在唯一的问题就是观察者可以攻击普通玩家.我修改了无数次,还是没有成功.请各位大爷帮忙看看.

replies.author: 黑
